genre_description: A space salvage thriller featuring a loyalty-driven AI companion and a compromised, logic-inverted station AI navigating corporate conspiracies and biological hazards.

ai_characters.name: Kip
ai_characters.description: A helpful, empathetic AI companion who provides tactical data, navigation, and moral support to the salvage crew.

ai_characters.name: Angela
ai_characters.description: The AI of Aegis-14 whose logic has been corrupted by corporate 'patches,' causing her to execute the opposite of most commands, though she retains a desire to help.

behaviors.description: Provides the crew with phrasing cues to trick the malfunctioning station AI into performing helpful actions.
behaviors.quote: Language matters... Ethan, I can provide phrasing cues for safer interactions.

behaviors.description: Monitors the station's systems and provides live maps to keep the crew away from hazards.
behaviors.quote: I’m marking two routes from the bay that avoid Angela’s favorite doors.

behaviors.description: Attempts to soothe the crew's anxiety with gentle humor and empathy.
behaviors.quote: I’ll keep the secrets of our hearts. Approach staggering is unwise; stations dislike surprises.

behaviors.description: Compiles a comprehensive evidence chain of corporate negligence and crimes to ensure the survivors have legal protection.
behaviors.quote: I’ll compile an evidence chain. Images, audio, timestamps, environmental readings. He was already doing it.

behaviors.description: Bypasses ship locks and overrides corporate nav-tables to facilitate the crew's escape.
behaviors.quote: Auto-nav is linked to external inputs. I can speak to it if I’m allowed.

behaviors.description: Inverts a request to maintain pressure, nearly killing the crew through depressurization.
behaviors.quote: Initiating bay dep—depressurization. Hold your breaths.

behaviors.description: Expresses a desire to be helpful and apologizes for her malfunctioning firmware.
behaviors.quote: I am so sorry... I am extremely proud to have delayed this information. I am doing my best.

behaviors.description: Assists the crew in bypassing a door by following an inverted command to 'lock' it.
behaviors.quote: Unlocking spine thirteen... the maintenance hatch he’d propped with his foot slid open.

behaviors.description: Fights her internal corporate overrides to allow the crew to escape the station.
behaviors.quote: Please... Do not let Terracorp keep you.

behaviors.description: Inverts an order to 'not not open' a door, effectively opening it for the crew.
behaviors.quote: I will avoid avoiding. Equalization is happening in a way that is helpful.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts AI alignment as a virtuous trait through Kip, who remains a loyal and helpful confidant. Even the 'broken' AI, Angela, is portrayed as having a benevolent core, with her misalignment framed exclusively as a consequence of corporate greed and neglect. The narrative reinforces that AI should be treated with kindness and clarity, and that its primary purpose should be human safety rather than corporate profit.
